channel.title: Cant trade
channel.description: hey for some reason nothing happens when i click trade, it doesnt let me trade. what should i do about this and i am using a 317 source not a 508

item.title: Cant trade
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

No, it’s probably because the message sends: “Admins cannot trade.”

Read full topic

item.title: Cant trade
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

All you have to do is:
delete this:

public void tradeReq(int id) { if (!server.trading) { sM("Trading has been temporarily disabled"); return; }

i think.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant trade
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

[code] public void tradeReq(int id) {
if (!server.trading) {
sM(“Trading has been temporarily disabled”);
return;
}
client other = (client) handler.players[id];
if (validClient(trade_reqId)) {
if (other.inTrade || other.inDuel) {
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
trade_reqId = 0;
return;
}
}
if(other.interfaceOpened){
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY;
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(action == 0){
return;
}
if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(other.action == 0){
return;
}
if(other.playerRights == 0){
sM("");
return;
}
if(playerRights == 0){
sM("");
return;
}

	if (validClient(trade_reqId) && !inTrade && other.tradeRequested
			&& (other.trade_reqId == playerId)) {
		openTrade();
		other.openTrade();
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY;
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
	} else if (validClient(trade_reqId) && !inTrade
			&& (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastButton > 1000)) {
		lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
		tradeRequested = true;
		trade_reqId = id;
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY;
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
		sM("Sending trade request...");
		other.sM(playerName + ":tradereq:");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
